name: Classic Car Stunt Parking - Driving Simulator 2017
name_original: Classic Car Stunt Parking - Driving Simulator 2017
description:
If you love driving classic cars and want to know how to park them accurately in parking lots then this parking game is for you!

Features:

Shift the gear to forward or backward as you need
Different Parking levels with parking hurdles in the modern city
Extreme Classic car driving experience
Realistic 3D city rooftop graphics for car parking real mania
5 different classic cars for driving
Real engine sounds
4 different cam angle.(Rotating,Top,Back,Front)
Realistic steering wheel ( Each wheel is designed special for unique driving experience. Every car has different parking skills.)
Perfect car physics and car simulation
